roleset.name: cause an electric shock in an object
roleset.note: ELECTROCUTE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'electrocute' based on sentences in ectb2. Verbnet entry 42.2. (from electrocute.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Typical: without instrument
example.text: ... The River Preservation Team also posted notices *ICH* on the riverbank in May asking [locals and out-of-town visitors]-1 *-1 not to poison or electrocute fish or catch them in nets.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Mary electrocuted John in the bathtub with her hairdryer.
